mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_badges (user_id, badge_id, get_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{badgeId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT b.badge_id, b.name, b.image, b.sido_code, b.gugun_code, b.type, ub.get_date FROM user_badges ub JOIN badges b ON ub.badge_id = b.badge_id WHERE ub.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ub.get_date DESC
